transcript:
I am afraid of getting the accounts mixed. So I ask you to put the money on your cards," replied D61okhov. "Don't stint yourself, we'll settle afterwards," he added, turning to Rost6v. 
The game continued; a waiter kept handing round champagne. 
All Rost6v's cards were beaten and he had eight hundred rubles scored up against him. He wrote "800 rubles" on a card, but while the waiter filled his glass he changed his mind and altered it to his usual stake of twenty rubles. 
"Leave it," said Dolo
